title: Doks Blog Post Frontmatter
description: Frontmatter schema specifically for blog posts in Doks

title.title: Post Title
title.description: The main title of your blog post

description.title: Meta Description
description.description: Brief description for SEO and social sharing

summary.title: Post Summary
summary.description: Short summary displayed on blog listing pages and cards

date.title: Publication Date
date.description: Date when the post was published

lastmod.title: Last Modified
lastmod.description: Date when the post was last updated

draft.title: Draft Status
draft.description: If true, post won't be published in production builds

weight.title: Sort Weight
weight.description: Order weight for sorting (lower numbers appear first)

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Primary categories this post belongs to

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags for categorizing and discovering content

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: Names of people who contributed to this post

pinned.title: Pin Post
pinned.description: Pin this post to the top of blog listings

homepage.title: Feature on Homepage
homepage.description: Show this post on the homepage

images.title: Social Images
images.description: Featured images for social media sharing

exclude_search.title: Exclude from Search
exclude_search.description: Don't include this post in search results

title.title: Custom SEO Title
title.description: Override the post title for SEO (optional)

description.title: Custom Meta Description
description.description: Custom meta description for search engines

canonical.title: Canonical URL
canonical.description: Canonical URL if content is published elsewhere
